properties.property: insert into t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx (id, czfwbh, zzbh, fzxm, fzsfzh, fzxb, jgdwdm, jgdwmc, ryjgbh, djbh, cqdw, lxdh, gljb, zzlx, sfxxy, czyt, fwlx, czjs, czmj, czsj, czyz, sjzzrs, hx, czzzsj, zxyy, dlr, dlrsfzh, dlrlxfs, sfqdzrz, bz, fwzt, gllb, djsj, djrxm, djdwmc, djdwdm, fwbh, CZFWBPBM, ZXHQSJ, djrsfzh) values (#[id], #[czfwbh], #[zzbh], #[fzxm], #[fzsfzh], #[fzxb], #[jgdwdm], #[jgdwmc], #[ryjgbh], #[djbh], #[cqdw], #[lxdh], #[gljb], #[zzlx], #[sfxxy], #[czyt], #[fwlx], #[czjs], #[czmj], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[czyz], #[sjzzrs], #[hx], to_date(#[czzzsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[zxyy], #[dlr], #[dlrsfzh], #[dlrlxfs], #[sfqdzrz], #[bz], #[fwzt], #[gllb], sysdate, #[djrxm], #[djdwmc], #[djdwdm], #[fwbh], #[czfwbpbm], to_date(#[zxhqsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[djrsfzh])

select id, fwbh, czfwbh, zzbh, fzxm, fzsfzh, fzxb, jgdwdm, jgdwmc, ryjgbh, djbh, cqdw, lxdh, gljb, zzlx, sfxxy, czyt, fwlx, czjs, czmj, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czsj, czyz, sjzzrs, hx, to_char(czzzsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czzzsj, zxyy, dlr, dlrsfzh, dlrlxfs, sfqdzrz, bz, fwzt, gllb, djsj, djrxm, djdwmc, djdwdm, fwbh, czfwbpbm, to_char(zxhqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxhqsj from t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx where 1=1

update t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx set id = #[id], zzbh = #[zzbh], fzxm = #[fzxm], fzsfzh = #[fzsfzh], fzxb = #[fzxb], jgdwdm = #[jgdwdm], jgdwmc = #[jgdwmc], ryjgbh = #[ryjgbh], djbh = #[djbh], cqdw = #[cqdw], lxdh = #[lxdh], gljb = #[gljb], zzlx = #[zzlx], sfxxy = #[sfxxy], czyt = #[czyt], fwlx = #[fwlx], czjs = #[czjs], czmj = #[czmj], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), czyz = #[czyz], sjzzrs = #[sjzzrs], hx = #[hx], czzzsj = to_date(#[czzzsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), zxyy = #[zxyy], dlr = #[dlr], dlrsfzh = #[dlrsfzh], dlrlxfs = #[dlrlxfs], sfqdzrz = #[sfqdzrz], bz = #[bz], fwzt = #[fwzt], gllb = #[gllb], fwbh = #[fwbh], czfwbpbm=#[czfwbpbm], zxhqsj=to_date(#[zxhqsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), XGSJ=sysdate where id = #[id]

select id, fwbh, czfwbh, zzbh, fzxm, fzsfzh, fzxb, jgdwdm, jgdwmc, ryjgbh, djbh, cqdw, lxdh, gljb, zzlx, sfxxy, czyt, fwlx, czjs, czmj, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czsj, czyz, sjzzrs, hx, to_char(czzzsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czzzsj, zxyy, dlr, dlrsfzh, dlrlxfs, sfqdzrz, bz, fwzt, gllb, djsj, djrxm, djdwmc, djdwdm, fwbh, czfwbpbm, to_char(zxhqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxhqsj from t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx where czfwbh=?

select id, fwbh, czfwbh, zzbh, fzxm, fzsfzh, fzxb, jgdwdm, jgdwmc, ryjgbh, djbh, cqdw, lxdh, gljb, zzlx, sfxxy, czyt, fwlx, czjs, czmj, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czsj, czyz, sjzzrs, hx, to_char(czzzsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czzzsj, zxyy, dlr, dlrsfzh, dlrlxfs, sfqdzrz, bz, fwzt, gllb, djsj, djrxm, djdwmc, djdwdm, fwbh, czfwbpbm, to_char(zxhqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxhqsj from t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx where fwbh=? order by djsj desc

select id, fwbh, czfwbh, zzbh, fzxm, fzsfzh, fzxb, jgdwdm, jgdwmc, ryjgbh, djbh, cqdw, lxdh, gljb, zzlx, sfxxy, czyt, fwlx, czjs, czmj, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czsj, czyz, sjzzrs, hx, to_char(czzzsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') czzzsj, zxyy, dlr, dlrsfzh, dlrlxfs, sfqdzrz, bz, fwzt, gllb, djsj, djrxm, djdwmc, djdwdm, fwbh, czfwbpbm, to_char(zxhqsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxhqsj from t_lsgl_czfw_jbxx where fwbh=? order by djsj desc
